title: 4  An unexpected error has occurred while logging in
body:
So, i was able to play league just fine 2 days ago, and since yesterday I can't login. An unexpected error has occurred pops up and I checked everything on the support page to see if it helps but everything is fine so I really don't know what's the problem, it doesn't work 
 can someone help me please.

replies.body: Typically, if you're seeing that unexpected error on the patcher, those are a sign that your pc isn't letting League scan it's game files. Let's check really quickly to make sure that you have all the right [**permission settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) in place to allow League to update.
Ive been getting the same thing, used up all the help posts I could find and still no luck.
